text: (Atarku avan) kurinan; "enakkulla arivin karanattal tan itanai nan kotukkappattirukkiren!" Ivanukku mun ivanai vita mikka valimaiyutaiyavarkalum, ivanai vita atikap porul cekarittu vaittiruntavarkalamana (ettanaiyo) talaimuraiyinarkalai allah alittirukkinran enpatai ivan ariyavillaiya? Anal kurravalikal avarkal ceyta pavankal parri (utanukkutan) kelvi kanakkuk ketkappata mattarkal
